scripts.assets:edgeDrawers: mkdir -p src/edge lib/edge && cp node_modules/kaavio/src/drawers/edges/index.ts src/edge/edgeDrawers.ts && cp node_modules/kaavio/lib/drawers/edges/index.js lib/edge/edgeDrawers.js
scripts.build: npm run assets && npm run compile
scripts.compile: mkdir -p lib && npm run assets && npm-run-all compile:*
scripts.compile:es5: tsc --project tsconfig.json && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.deleteUnconvertables: echo 'Knowns: cannot convert nested groups or GPML formatted as xmllint pretty 2. Removing such test cases.' && touch node_modules/@wikipathways/gpml/test/2013a/xmllint-pretty2.gpml && rm node_modules/@wikipathways/gpml/test/2013a/xmllint-pretty2.gpml && touch node_modules/@wikipathways/gpml/test/2013a/WP481.gpml && rm node_modules/@wikipathways/gpml/test/2013a/WP481.gpml
scripts.expected: echo 'Setting expected values and checksums for tests'; npm-run-all deleteUnconvertables expected:* && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.expected:protocol: npm run deleteUnconvertables; for f in node_modules/@wikipathways/gpml/test/**/*.gpml{,.xml}; do echo "Converting $f to JSON and generating checksum..."; filename=`echo "$f" | sed "s/.*\///" | sed 's/\.xml$//' | sed 's/\.gpml$//'`; cat "$f" | bin/gpml2pvjson | tee "test/expected/$filename.json" | shasum -p -a 1 > "test/expected/$filename.json.sha1sum" || break; done
scripts.prepare: npm run build && npm run test && npm run expected
scripts.test: npm-run-all test:* && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.test:checksums:chunked: echo 'Testing converter against WP1818 rev. 73650 from GPML file stored online (intentionally throttling downloading speed in order to ensure response is chunked).' && curl --limit-rate 10K "https://cdn.rawgit.com/wikipathways/pvjs/e47ff1f6/test/input-data/troublesome-pathways/WP1818_73650.gpml" | bin/gpml2pvjson --id http://identifiers.org/wikipathways/WP1818 --pathway-version 73650 | shasum -p -a 1 > "test/expected/chunked.json.sha1sum"
scripts.test:checksums:protocol: npm run deleteUnconvertables; for f in node_modules/@wikipathways/gpml/test/**/*.gpml{,.xml}; do echo "Testing converter against $f"; filename=`echo "$f" | sed "s/.*\///" | sed s/.xml$// | sed s/.gpml$//`; cat "$f" | bin/gpml2pvjson | shasum -p -a 1 -c "test/expected/$filename.json.sha1sum" || break; done
